page.title: 03LOCHTY PRIVATE RAILWAY
page.content: The Lochty Private Railway, was open in 1967, it is sited on part of the former East Fife Central Railway. Lochty Station is on the B940 Cupar to Crail road. It's the home of a collection of steam locomotives and other rolling stock currently undergoing restoration by the Fife Preservation Group. The one mile long line is open to visitors every Sunday with a steam train service running on Sunday afternoons. Due to extensive track renewals, this year the length of run is unfortunately curtailed to about half_a_mile.
